gramiya janathawage ithurum grama sanwardhana samithi kriyakarithwaya haraha surakshitha kirima me bankuwe mukhya aramuna bawa ema departhamenthuwa pawasayi.pradeshiya lekam kottasa 40ka kriyathmakawana grama sanwardhana samithi widhimathwa prathisanwidhanaya kara pradeshiya disthrik ha palath washayen balamandala pihituwimatada ee thulin paladayi yojana handunagena kriyathmaka kirimatada piyawara gane.palath nishchitha sanwardhana pradana yatathe grama sanwardhana samithi 150k sandaha upakarana laba dima, grama niladhari kottasa athurin danata grama sanwardhana samithi pihituwa nathi kottasawala ema samithi pihituwima, ema godanagili idikirima, gramiya nayakayan puhunu kirima jiwanopaya sanwardhana wadamuluwa pawathwima nishpadana alewisal 6k sthapanaya kirima idiri masa kipaya athulathadi sidu kirimada palath departhamenthuwe apekshawa weyi.grama sanwardhana samithi saha ema samithi niladharin atharada tharaga pawathwa janathawa thula ema samithi katayuthu pilibandawa nawa hangimak ha nawa pibidimak athi kirimatada piyawara gane..

ada (12da) sita 19 wanida dakwa sathiyak pawathwena mema wadasatahan malawata samagamiwa pasal lamayin wenuwen pasal upakarana bedadima werala udyana pirisudu kirima, jana sahana arunalu wadasatahana aadi wadasatahan rasak sidu kere. 1943 warshaye komiyunist pakshayen mathara maha nagara sabhawe sabhikayaku lesa pathwu ohu 1952 wasaredi ema pakshayen mathara mathiwarana kottasayata tharaga kota jaya laba shri lanka parlimenthuwa niyojanaya kaleya.
